name: Idle Invaders!
description:
Idle Invaders is a turn-based Space Invaders made for the 1-bit clicker jam. Click your way through 999 levels of vicious invaders! Upgrade your gun, repair your buildings and add shields for protection.

Every click you make moves the game forward by about a second! Beware!

Update 2: I've just uploaded an experimental version of the game for Android devices!

Update: Fixed a few bugs (works well in full screen mode now!). There is also a windows version available for download.
